channel.title: My server goes down every 10minutes for ages (even for me)
channel.description: Hi when i host my server online, it doesn't matter what source it is.. it goes down for aages every like 10minutes and not even i can get on.. i don't know what it is can anyone help?! cheers.

item.title: My server goes down every 10minutes for ages (even for me)
item.dc:creator: @run3scap3_uk run3scap3_uk
item.description:
@run3scap3_uk wrote:

You cannot remove “Portforward” from your router, if you do it correctly it’ll be there until you reset your router. But when you portforward, make sure your “Utorrent” is completely off your toolbar. If you have any more coding issues add me on msn: Sexy_robert_manu@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
item.source: My server goes down every 10minutes for ages (even for me)

item.title: My server goes down every 10minutes for ages (even for me)
item.dc:creator: @Hells-History Hells-History
item.description:
@Hells-History wrote:

owner 54:

Okay cheers dude, but if i decide to stop running the server… do i need to remove the portforward from my router? will it effect it or anything? …

It shouldnt effect anything, unless your gona be using that port for somthing else, if not just leave it.

Read full topic
